para.text: Provide support to pregnant individuals and their families, including surrogates and adoptive parents;
Accompany pregnant individuals to health care and social service appointments;
Connect individuals to medical, community-based, or government-funded resources, including those addressing social determinants of health; and
Provide support to individuals following either the loss of pregnancy or birth of a child for up to one year.
Perform clinical tasks or replace trained licensed medical professionals; or
Engage in the practice of medicine as defined in § 3-1201.02(7).
